resources.string: I am a Jehovah\'s Witness, and I do not accept ANY TRANSFUSION of whole blood, red blood cells, white blood cells, platelets or plasma under any circumstances, even if healthcare professionals feel it is necessary for the maintenance of my life. (Acts 15:28, 29) I refuse to make advance donations and refuse to store my blood for later infusion.
Notification channel to display special information on the lock screen.
Notification service is required to display health information on lock screen. It will also allow the use of the Emergency application. Do you want to allow the feature?
Service will not work on lock screen without Notification permission. Do you want to open settings?
